General.Name: Nanjing Yunhai Special Metals Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Yunhai Special Metals Co., Ltd. engages in mining and non-ferrous metal smelting, recycling, and processing in China and internationally. It offers magnesium, aluminum, strontium, and other raw materials. The company's products include metal magnesium, magnesium alloys, aluminum alloys, and dolomite. It also provides metal strontium, magnesium particles, master alloy, and die casting products. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: No. 9, Xiushan East Road, Nanjing, China, 211200
